title: The 4th Islamic Solidarity Games – Handball
text:
The 4th Islamic Solidarity Games – Handball Posted , 2017-04-16 Email this page The fourth Islamic Solidarity Games take place from 8-22 May in Baku, Azerbaijan and will feature men's and women's handball. 
Last week the draw was made for the male and female preliminary round groups who will compete at the Sarhadchi Arena over the six-day competition from 9-14 May. 
The team sport draw Get the top news stories delivered directly to your inbox! We also discuss the new Amiibo for The Legend of Zelda, Super Smash Bros, and Pikmin. Japanese games are showing Western devs HOW IT'S DONE! published: 14 Apr 2017 Japanese games are showing Western devs HOW IT'S DONE! Japanese games are showing Western devs HOW IT'S DONE! published: 14 Apr 2017 views: 16352 
Japan has a long, storied association with video games. The history of video games is tied inseparably from that of Japan, thanks to the likes of Nintendo, Sony and SEGA. Is that past glory starting to resurface! Sources Japan.
